channel.title: Enterprise Bandwidth on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprise Bandwidth on 0x000216

item.title: 10 Gig E WAN Comes To The Enterprise
item.description: It may seem surprising, but businesses can now access 10 Gigabit Ethernet connections for their wide area networks. What’s even more surprising is how many businesses can actually utilize this bandwidth. Gigabit Ethernet is becoming increasingly popular among large corporations and tech companies that need to manage and deliver massive amounts of data quickly. What kinds of companies are we talking about? For those involved in video production or editing, Gigabit per second connections are essential.

item.title: Wavelength Services For The Enterprise
item.description: Initially only utilized by telecom companies, wavelength services are now accessible to large organizations. These high-bandwidth fiber optic services are necessary for entities like hospitals, financial institutions, government service providers, video production companies, content delivery networks, and research facilities. The demand for faster data transfer solutions is constantly increasing. But are wavelength services the answer? A wavelength, or lambda, is light at a specific frequency, similar to a distinct color. It is usually measured in nanometers (wavelength) rather than terabits per second (frequency).
